name: British Airways First Class Cabin, Club Europe Service! Special 777 flight, MAD-LHR.
description:
Thanks to an aircraft substitution, I managed to fly in First Class seat 1A on a British Airways Boeing 777-200 between Madrid and London Heathrow. The service was Club Europe, but the seats and cabin were First Class! Enjoy.

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
